name: agafbot
description: WhatsApp automation bot with AI-powered responses using Groq API

scripts.package-win: npm run build-win && mkdir -p ./dist/win && cp ./dist/agafbot-win.exe ./dist/win/ && cp ./start.bat ./dist/win/ && cp ./INSTALL.md ./dist/win/ && cd dist && rimraf agafbot-win.zip && 7z a -tzip agafbot-win.zip win/*
scripts.package-linux: npm run build-linux && mkdir -p ./dist/linux && cp ./dist/agafbot-linux ./dist/linux/ && cp ./start.sh ./dist/linux/ && cp ./INSTALL.md ./dist/linux/ && cd dist && rimraf agafbot-linux.tar.gz && tar -czvf agafbot-linux.tar.gz linux/*
scripts.package-all: npm run package-win && npm run package-linux
